resources.string:
Studio may ask its users to provide necessary identifiable personal information
on using the services to incorporate with other data for improving user’s
experience, which users can turn down any time before proceeding to use the
services. Bear in mind, Straps App Studio does not deliberately offer its
services to the users under the age of 13. So, Straps App Studio urges all of
the users under the age of 13 to seek parental guidance before undertaking the
services. Straps App Studio also advises the parents to monitor and keep a
track of internet activities of their children.\n
By using
the services and products of Straps App Studio, you agree to observe and be
bound by this privacy policy. Straps App Studio has your approval of
collection, processing, use and disclose of the information given by you. You
hereby accept the terms and conditions set by Straps App Studio.
You may
withdraw by not proceeding to using services and products of Straps App Studio. \nAccess to Smartphone Features:
Straps App
Studio may ask its users to allow access to various features of their
smartphones such as camera, microphone, contacts and location solely for the
purposes of aligning with the features of our services and products and also to
increase efficiency and providing influential user experience.

string.name: fragment2
string.b: Information Collected by Straps Studio APP:
string.p:
Users over
the age of 13 will be asked to register before they will be able to use our
products and services. Users will have to provide their username, password,
date of birth and email address. Straps App Studio may attain some non-personal
data to enhance the user experience on the services and products that it
provides. Non-personal data may include: browser type, device version, type of
device and IP address. Please note that this statistical data will solely be
used to analyse demographical progress. \n This will help Straps App Studio in
identifying target market and certain areas to focus and bring improvement to. Straps
App Studio may ask users to provide contact information for surveys and
communication for future prospects and expectations of users from the
developers. Statistical data may also include high scores, timings and user
activities on the services and products to boost up the environment.

Straps App
Studio also offers its users to submit their information through any of social
media platform. Users must be of age 13 to register on these platforms. Straps
App Studio may obtain data such as name, user ID, gender, location, avatar,
date of birth and email address. Straps App Studio assures its users that all
of the necessary gained personal information is encrypted.
string.b: \nUse and disclose of the information collected:

string.name: fragment3
string.p:
Straps App
Studio collects information only to improve the design of services and products
to garner more target audience. Straps App Studio ensure its users that all the
information collected through services or social media platform are fully
encrypted and are in hashed form through proper channels. Straps App Studio
takes immense measures to safeguard all the information and prevents from
unauthorized access.
However, on
certain occasions, Straps App Studio may disclose information to third parties
for advertising purposes. Straps App Studio use ad campaigns and utilities to
steer its products forward on the market and also for revenue generation
functions. Users’ information may be collected to tailor the advertisements
that may interest them.
Straps App
Studio may also disclose information to third parties in case if Straps App
Studio feels there is viable cause to bring a legal action against someone
deliberately sabotaging services and products.
Straps App
Studio also advises the users to take necessary precautions when asked for
information by third parties which are governed under their policies. Please
read those policies carefully and then proceed. MetaUsage
We are using Meta service or facebook audience network for face ads running in our product it contains ads or monetization that can help us our business point.
Here we are showing facebook ads to use.

In order to
suggest variations, amendments and changes to our current privacy policy, feel
free to write, email or contact Straps App Studio on the contact information
provided.
